title: Lifting the veil
description:
Yoga Instructors, India Amara and Krista Starr, approached me to design and brand their social media campaign. I designed and executed a month long social media calendar and an event poster leading to the retreat date.

Using photography from Matthew Manhire, I designed the campaign around the significance of the triangle, which in yoga practice represents feminity and empowerment. A triangle facing downwards represents womanhood and strength, which is central to the two womenâ€™s practice.

My role: Art Direction and design.
